// Pivot 0, 0
int flipper[18] = {
	3, 17,
	57, 32,
	62, 30,
	63, 23,
	59, 19,
	10, 0,
	3, 2,
	0, 9,
	2, 16
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flipper[18] = {
	0.046875f, 0.531250f,
	0.890625f, 1.000000f,
	0.968750f, 0.937500f,
	0.984375f, 0.718750f,
	0.921875f, 0.593750f,
	0.156250f, 0.000000f,
	0.046875f, 0.062500f,
	0.000000f, 0.281250f,
	0.031250f, 0.500000f
};
